original_text: One Sabbath Jesus was going through the grainfields, and as his disciples walked along, they began to pick some heads of grain.
korean_text: 안식일에 예수께서 밀밭 사이로 지나가실새 그의 제자들이 길을 열며 이삭을 자르니

sentences.original_text: One Sabbath Jesus was going through the grainfields
sentences.korean_translation: 안식일에 예수님은 곡식 밭을 지나가고 계셨습니다

sentences.original_text: and as his disciples walked along
they began to pick some heads of grain
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 이삭 몇 개를 뜯기 시작했습니다
